user.description: Enter your Fellow Aiden account credentials.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Fellow Aiden
reauth_confirm.description: Your credentials have expired. Enter your current Fellow account password.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Fellow Aiden
reconfigure.description: Update your Fellow Aiden account credentials.

data_description.email: The email address you use to sign in to the Fellow app.

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to Fellow servers. Try again later.

abort.wrong_account: This is a different Fellow account than the one originally configured.

init.title: Fellow Aiden options
init.description: Adjust polling settings. Changing the interval restarts the integration.

data_description.update_interval_seconds: How often to poll the Fellow cloud API. Minimum 30 seconds, default 60.

error.too_fast: Update interval must be at least 30 seconds.

create_profile.name: Create brew profile
create_profile.description: Create a new brew profile on the Fellow Aiden.

bloom_enabled.name: Bloom enabled
bloom_enabled.description: Whether to use a bloom phase.

bloom_ratio.name: Bloom ratio
bloom_ratio.description: Water used in bloom relative to coffee weight (1.0-3.0).

ss_pulses_enabled.name: Single serve pulses enabled
ss_pulses_enabled.description: Enable pulses for single serve brewing.

ss_pulse_temperatures.name: Single serve pulse temperatures
ss_pulse_temperatures.description: Temperature list for each single serve pulse, e.g. [96, 97, 98].

batch_pulse_temperatures.name: Batch pulse temperatures
batch_pulse_temperatures.description: Temperature list for each batch pulse, e.g. [96, 97].

delete_profile.name: Delete brew profile
delete_profile.description: Delete a brew profile by ID.

profile_id.name: Profile ID
profile_id.description: ID of the profile to delete (e.g. 'p1').

create_schedule.name: Create brew schedule
create_schedule.description: Create a brewing schedule. Make sure a carafe or cup is in place before the scheduled time.

profile_name.name: Profile name
profile_name.description: Name of the brew profile to use.

schedule_id.name: Schedule ID
schedule_id.description: ID of the schedule to delete.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: True to enable, false to disable.

list_profiles.name: List profiles
list_profiles.description: Returns all brew profiles with their names and IDs.

get_profile_details.name: Get profile details
get_profile_details.description: Returns full details for a profile.

profile_id.name: Profile ID
profile_id.description: ID of the profile (alternative to name).

reset_water_tracking.name: Reset water tracking
reset_water_tracking.description: Resets the water usage baseline. Period sensors will read 0 until new usage is recorded.

debug_water_usage.name: Debug water usage
debug_water_usage.description: Returns raw water usage history for troubleshooting.

refresh_and_log_data.name: Refresh and log data
refresh_and_log_data.description: Forces a data refresh and returns the full API response.

not_loaded.message: Fellow Aiden integration is not loaded. Check Settings > Integrations.

provide_profile_id_or_name.message: Provide a profile name or profile ID.

provide_schedule_profile.message: Provide a profile name or profile ID.
